project.description: Volatility - Step 2 - Analyze Process DLLs and Handles

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MEMORY_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Pat of the raw memory image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the location of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_PROFILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the profile of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build output paths.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the evidence processing output

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: vol.py dlllist >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/dlllist_output vol.py getsids >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/getsids_output vol.py handles >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/handles_output vol.py filescan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/filescan_output vol.py mutantscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mutantscan_output vol.py svcscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/svcscan_output vol.py cmdscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/cmdscan_output vol.py consoles >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/consoles_output
